attributes.action: Access to Treatment To Royal National Hospital for Rhuematic Diseases Nationally as Post Code Lottery is still on going to many patients
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Look into why patients with Ankylosing Spondylitis  are being denied funding from Primary Care Trusts in some parts of the United Kingdom to participate on the two week residential courses at The Royal National Hospital For Rhuematic Diseases in Bath. Patients are having their funding refused after many years of being treated at this Hospital of Excellence. The treatment is as important as medications to be able to self manage our disease.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
